msg: DIRMINA-463: Changed StateMachineFactory to make it simpler to specify the transition annotation to use. Removed IoHandlerStateMachineFactory and IoFilterStateMachineFactory.

author: bayard
msg: Renamed 'Reference' to 'About Apache', and moved the Jakarta Guidelines up to the 'About Jakarta' section

author: dkulp
msg: Handle checked exceptions in JAX-RS. Note this is still a very much experimental stuff, more work needs to do on a).handle unchecked exceptions and exceptions thrown from cxf runtime b).how to handle exceptions for different media types c). compatible with JSR-311
Looks like the CC did not run all of tests , ignore the test to fix the build
CXF-1004: Added a system test that creates resource instances by Spring, then pass the instance to JAX-RS runtime.
* AddressingFeature support both at the client side and server side
